catalog_script_client.name: Mascara de Cep

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_6ddababb970dc6905e9fb680f053affc
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable>IO:5ed8f5284744021008334d05516d43e0</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Mascara de Cep</name><order/><published_ref/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }

	var cep = g_form.getValue('cep');
	var cepReplaced = cep.replace(/\D/g, '');
	
   if(cepReplaced.length !== 8){
	alert('CEP DEVE POSSUIR  8 NUMEROS');
	g_form.setValue('cep', '');
   } else {
	

	var mascara = cepReplaced.substring(0, 5) + '-' + cepReplaced.substring(5, 8);
	g_form.setValue('cep', mascara);

   }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-03-27 02:46:40</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>6ddababb970dc6905e9fb680f053affc</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Mascara de Cep</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Case Banco Brasil Tecnologia" source="x_1174267_case_b_0">c1eb252c4704021008334d05516d4344</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Case Banco Brasil Tecnologia">c1eb252c4704021008334d05516d4344</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_6ddababb970dc6905e9fb680f053affc</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-03-27 02:46:40</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><va_supported>true</va_supported><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
